code: import React,{Component}from'react';import UserFunctionality from'./UserFunctionality/UserFunctionality';import'./UserPanel.css';import UserProfile from'./UserProfile/UserProfile';import dashboardIcon from'../../../assets/dashboard-icon.png';import userManagementIcon from'../../../assets/user-management.png';import postManagementIcon from'../../../assets/post-management.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let userPanelMap={'dashboard':{'name':"Dashboard",'icon':dashboardIcon},'userManagement':{'name':"User Management",'icon':userManagementIcon},'postManagement':{'name':"Post Management",'icon':postManagementIcon}};class UserPanel extends Component{render(){const{userName,userPhoto,changeView,view}=this.props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"userPanel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProfile,{name:userName,photo:userPhoto}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>changeView('userManagement'),className:view==='userManagement'?' changeBtnAdmin changeBtnActiveAdmin':'changeBtnAdmin',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserFunctionality,{userFunction:userPanelMap.userManagement})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>changeView('postManagement'),className:view==='postManagement'?' changeBtnAdmin changeBtnActiveAdmin':'changeBtnAdmin',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserFunctionality,{userFunction:userPanelMap.postManagement})})]});}}export default UserPanel;
